name: Rail of Rhythm
description:
Hola camarada,como estas?

Welcome to the world of the RAIL OF RHYTHM.In this game,your objective is: SHOOT AND KILL YOUR ENEMIES USING YOUR PISTOL AND THE MUSIC!
But for that,you need listen carefully the music and shoot in the right beat.When you able to shoot,the aim will grow a little bit.To Shoot,use the LEFT BUTTON MOUSE.
So,prepare your aim and try destroy these bottles with your skill COMPADRE!

Rail Shooter with Rhythm game

Team:

https://goatzilla.itch.io/
